title: In the Land of Zebulon and Naphtali
itunes:title: In the Land of Zebulon and Naphtali
description: Our first reading from the prophet Isaiah and our Gospel are tightly linked, for St. Matthew, in articulating the meaning of Jesus, cites (as is his wont) an Old Testament text窶馬amely, our reading from the eighth and ninth chapters of Isaiah. The prophet speaks of conflict in the land of Zebulon and Naphtali, and then of a great light that shines in that area, signaling the victory of God.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
